name: Cyber 6
description:
Description:

Cyber 6 is a cyberpunk-themed, futuristic endless runner where you must use an array of gadgets and your wits to manipulate the environment as you escape from an ever-creeping police force!

Current Progress:

The game is still in development, and there are many assets that are subject to change. Some bugs and issues may occur during gameplay. 

Features:

The game allows complete freedom of movement! Players are not bound by lanes, and can freely jump, dash, and dodge through obstacles and enemies. 

Controls:

WASD to move

SPACEBAR to jump, hold for more height

LEFT-CLICK to dash through obstacles
